description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows graphics component elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43556), the following updates are recommended:

1. Download and apply the appropriate update package for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure your system is running a compatible build number to successfully install the fix.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates available are KB5044284, KB5044285, KB5044280, and KB5044273, which target various versions of Windows 10 and 11.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your operating system is one of the specified Windows versions as per the build numbers provided.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
